headline.main: LINDBERGH BELITTLED TO RESERVE OFFICERS; ' Too Much Made of Incident,' Gov. Lehman's Aide Says

lead_paragraph: ALBANY, May 2 -- Criticism of Charles A. Lindbergh was expressed today by Captain Walter T. Brown, secretary to Governor Lehman, in welcoming in behalf of the Governor the Reserve Officers Association of New York at the opening of its two-day convention here.
abstract: belittled by Capt W T Brown

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: RESERVE OFFICERS ASSN OF N Y
